name: Magi Et Miles
description:
Magi et Miles is a Minecraft mod that introduces a new level of magical depth and 
aesthetic beauty to the game. With a focus on spell tomes and magical effects, players can craft and use stunning 
new spells to transform the world around them. Whether it's summoning the winds to aid you in battle or accelerating 
plant growth with the cast of a spell, each spell is unique and visually captivating. With the addition of rare ingredients 
and new crafting systems, players must delve deep into the nether and beyond to master the art of magic and become 
true magi or miles.
